thread.title_full: Trip to Paris from Middle age man to meet his daughter - Review of Hotel Roma Sacre Coeur, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: G1071ISmikem
title: Trip to Paris from Middle age man to meet his daughter
text:
Really liked the locale near metro, low cost, ease of getting in and out (much like an apartment), English speaking managers, safe feel. Sound carried between walls and down halls but a sound app on my Kindle helped even out unwanted noises.
Room Tip: as above, great value, convenience to metro See more room tips
